questions.question: Can I change my plan later?
questions.ans: You are always free to change the plan of your POS system.

questions.ans: Depending on the POS system and contract, the cancellation policy differs.

questions.question: How does billing work?
questions.ans: Free, monthly or yearly depending on your contract.
